evidence.source_document: Brief in Support of Motion for Preliminary and Permanent Injunction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek immediate injunction of the Canada Orders. Plaintiffs ask that the Court set a hearing on this motion at its earliest possible time, and enjoin the Canada Orders.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs ask the Court to enjoin Sections 2(a), (b), (d), (f), (g), and (h) of Executive Order 14193 as amended;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Enjoin Sections 2(a), (b), (d), (f), (g), and (h) of Executive Order 14193

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs ask the Court to enjoin Section 14 of Proclamations 10896 and 10895;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Enjoin Section 14 of Proclamations 10896 and 10895

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs ask the Court to either: stay tariffs on all commerce and goods at the Roosville, Del Bonita, and Piegan/Carway ports of entry.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Stay tariffs on all commerce and goods at the Roosville, Del Bonita, and Piegan/Carway ports of entry

evidence.text: Defendants seek to transfer jurisdiction of this matter to the Court of International Trade, arguing the Trade Court

extracted.value: Defendant: Transfer jurisdiction of this matter to the Court of International Trade

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 164.  Grant such other relief as the Court deems just and proper.

extracted.value: Grant such other relief as the Court deems just and proper.
